stories.text: I'm finding it very difficult to find the right desk for me. Amazon is not proving helpful, nor IKEA or Etsy or Wayfair or Overstock or google in general. I need new ideas!
stories.title: Ask HN: What desk do you use at home, where did you get it, and do you like it?

stories.text:
I built software to help me organize and understand my thoughts. It works as an automated system that will call me and read a script, and respond based on voice input. It uses text-to-speech and speech-to-text to adapt responses to what I say.

For example, I can go through to script to help me prioritize my day and what to work on. I can clarify my thinking best by speaking, and the script being read out keeps me on track and accountable.

I'm curious, Hacker News - is this something you would find useful? How would you like to use it; what types of scripts would you write?
stories.title: Organize Thoughts with Custom Voice Input System
